description.ko: AQUA-5와 함께 심해의 비밀을 밝혀내세요. 극한의 수압과 완벽한 어둠을 견디도록 설계된 이 기체는 최첨단 생물 발광 센서와 강화 티타늄 선체를 갖추어 궁극의 심해 탐험을 실현합니다.
description.en: Unveil the secrets of the abyss with AQUA-5. Designed for extreme pressure and absolute darkness, this vessel features advanced bioluminescent sensors and a reinforced titanium hull for the ultimate deep-sea expedition.

prompt: A sleek, high-tech submersible vessel named AQUA-5 navigating through the midnight zone of the deep ocean, cinematic lighting with neon blue bioluminescence, surrounded by ancient hydrothermal vents and glowing deep-sea flora, bubbles rising in pressurized water, hyper-realistic, 8k, dark navy and cyan color palette.
